item.title: All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies
item.description:
All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies

SYDNEY, Australia - So many adults are spending their days colouring in the lines, pencil companies are struggling to cope with the demand for coloured pencils and felt tip pens. Staedtler , the German company which produces felt tip pens and coloured pencils, has seen significant growth in Australia as adults get obsessed with the mindful trend.

item.title: Cooling off: TWIG brings Japanese-style cold brewing to London
item.description:
Cooling off: TWIG brings Japanese-style cold brewing to London

When self-proclaimed tea fanatic and yoga teacher Iona Carter travelled to Kanazawa, Japan last year, something about their brews seemed extra cool. A local specialty, the process of cold brewing tea inspired Carter to launch her own London-based company, TWIG Teas.

item.title: New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you
item.description:
New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you

Up until now, we've really only seen SpaceX's rocket landing in the middle of the ocean from afar. Chase planes near the drone ship provided a spectacular view of the milestone event, but now, S...

item.title: 7 Amazing Photos To Celebrate National Parks Week - Moment
item.description:
7 Amazing Photos To Celebrate National Parks Week - Moment

It's National Parks Week! This year is a big one to celebrate as the National Park Service celebrates its 100th birthday! That's 100 years of road trips out west, swimming in lakes, climbing mountains, sharing the roadways with roaming wildlife and camping with friends and family.
